replies.msg:
Adrien Rabiot's PSG contract renewal has been put on hold. According to L'Equipe, both sides are holding firm, although PSG don't want to lose the player.

According to L'Equipe, Alex Sandro could join PSG as the French champions look to strengthen their defence. Jerome Boateng is also said to be on PSG's radar.
